statements: SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT standard_name, compliance_status FROM sustainability_standards WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, standard_name, last_audit_date FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT supplier_id, standard_name, compliance_status FROM sustainability_standards WHERE last_audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, standard_name, compliance_status, last_audit_date FROM sustainability_standards WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_audit_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, standard_name FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND last_audit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT standard_name, supplier_id FROM sustainability_standards WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY standard_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_suppliers, AVG(supplier_id) AS avg_supplier_id FROM sustainability_standards;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM Standards ORDER BY standard_name DESC;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM Standards WHERE compliance_level = true;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM Suppliers WHERE compliance_status = true
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3
SELECT s.supplier_name, s.compliance_status, st.standard_name, st.compliance_level FROM Suppliers s JOIN Standards st ON s.compliance_status = st.compliance_level
SELECT supplier_name, CASE WHEN sustainability_rating > 3 THEN 'Highly Sustainable' ELSE 'Not Sustainable' END AS sustainability_status FROM Suppliers
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM SustainabilityStandards WHERE responsible_organization = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, c.standard_name, c.compliance_status, c.last_inspection_date FROM Suppliers s JOIN ComplianceData c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Not Compliant' ORDER BY c.last_inspection_date DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.location, ss.standard_name, ss.description FROM Suppliers s JOIN ComplianceData c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id JOIN SustainabilityStandards ss ON c.standard_name = ss.standard_name WHERE c.last_inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' AND s.sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY s.supplier_name ASC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.location, ss.responsible_organization FROM Suppliers s JOIN ComplianceData c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id JOIN SustainabilityStandards ss ON c.standard_name = ss.standard_name WHERE ss.responsible_organization LIKE '%Environment%' AND s.location IN ('California', 'Texas') ORDER BY s.supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_score FROM suppliers WHERE sustainability_score > 80;
SELECT standard_name, standard_description FROM standards WHERE LENGTH(standard_description) > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM suppliers INNER JOIN supplier_compliance ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_compliance.supplier_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE sustainability_score > 80 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, sustainability_score FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'USA' AND sustainability_score BETWEEN 50 AND 70;

SELECT s.standard_name, s.standard_description, sc.compliance_status FROM standards s JOIN supplier_compliance sc ON s.standard_id = sc.standard_id WHERE sc.compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY s.standard_name;

SELECT s.supplier_name, c.update_date, c.update_description FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_compliance sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id JOIN compliance_history c ON sc.compliance_id = c.compliance_id WHERE c.update_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY c.update_date DESC;

SELECT s.supplier_name, c.compliance_status, ch.update_date FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_compliance sc ON s.supplier_id = sc.supplier_id JOIN compliance_history ch ON sc.compliance_id = ch.compliance_id WHERE c.compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant' AND ch.update_date = (SELECT MAX(update_date) FROM compliance_history WHERE compliance_id = sc.compliance_id);
SELECT * FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_status FROM supplier_data WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM supplier_data ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT s.*, c.* FROM supplier_data s INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_data;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM supplier_data ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, compliance_date, compliance_description FROM supplier_data JOIN compliance_records ON supplier_data.supplier_id = compliance_records.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, standard_name FROM supplier_data JOIN supplier_standards ON supplier_data.supplier_id = supplier_standards.supplier_id JOIN standards ON supplier_standards.standard_id = standards.standard_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
